mapper.update: UPDATE feed SET feed_type = #{feed_type}, feed_auth = #{feed_auth}, feed_content = #{feed_content}, feed_file = #{feed_file}, feed_filename = #{feed_filename}, feed_ip = #{feed_ip} WHERE feed_num = #{feed_num}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, to_char(a.feedc_modify_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') str_date FROM (SELECT * FROM feed_comment c JOIN member m USING(mem_num) ORDER BY c.feedc_num DESC) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT feedc_num, COUNT(*) countComment FROM feed_comment GROUP BY feedc_num) b ON a.feedc_num = b.feedc_num WHERE a.feed_num = #{feed_num}
